name: io.github.starwind-ui/starwind-ui-mcp
description: A TypeScript implementation of a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Starwind UI, providing tools to help developers work with Starwind UI components.

tools.name: init_project
tools.description: Initializes a new Starwind UI project

tools.name: install_component
tools.description: Generates installation commands for Starwind UI components

tools.name: update_component
tools.description: Generates update commands for Starwind UI components

tools.name: get_documentation
tools.description: Returns documentation links for Starwind UI components and guides

tools.name: fetch_llm_data
tools.description: Fetches LLM data from starwind.dev (rate limited, with caching)

tools.name: get_package_manager
tools.description: Detects and returns the current package manager information
